name: Ocellus Cushion Cover - Midnight Green
description: Taking inspiration from the beauty of the natural world, the Ocellus Cushion Cover makes a feature of the series of peacock-feather motifs that cover its front. A popular symbol for a number of cultures, the peacock is regarded variously as signaling nobility, dignity, and rejuvenation; add a touch of any one of these traits to a sofa or favorite armchair, with this opulently, embroidered piece – each finished by hand.
